fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
> - Factional chat
> - Factional kill when no kill capable roles exist
> - Does not have roles. Any role with the attribute "__**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__." in **bold** and __underlined__ may spawn with either that respective faction, or the Daily Streak faction.
> - Factional mechanics that roles require may be transferred over if the host determines a role does not function without that mechanic, such as the Necronomicon.
> - Roles considered "invalid" cannot spawn in the Daily Streak faction, but can spawn in their original faction.
> - Each person, individually, can only make one role for the Daily Streak faction per day. Any role submitted in the same day after one has been submitted by that player is considered invalid.
> - Only people that have made roles for the Daily Streak faction every day since January 2nd 2024 may make roles for the faction. Roles made by someone who has not had a daily streak since then are considered invalid.
> - Each person gets three strikes until they're out.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who can't do the same thing every day.
